**unfoldingWord | Open Bible Stories**

**an unrestricted visual mini-Bible in any language**



Open Bible Stories, v. 3.2.1

Created by Distant Shores Media () and the Door43 world missions community ().

**License:**

This work is made available under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License ().

You are free:

* **Share** — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format

* **Adapt** — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Under the following conditions:

* **Attribution** — You must attribute the work as follows: "Original work available at 

****

**** must include the **unfoldingWord** logo when distributed to others. But if you alter the content in any way, you must remove the **unfoldingWord** logo before distributing your work.

Attribution of artwork: All images used in these stories are © Sweet Publishing () and are made available under a Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike License ().

To our brothers and sisters in Christ all over the world—the global church. It is our prayer that God would use this visual overview of His Word to bless, strengthen, and encourage you.
name: Open Bible Stories
